42000000.text:
What a delicious-looking fruit!
Thank you.

42000001.text:
Finally I can
get some bait!

42000002.text:
Oh, shiny stuff!
Thank you, purr!

42000004.text:
Finally, I can have
peace of mind.

42000005.text:
Take a look at this lotus leaf umbrella.
Nice, isn't it? Hah hah!

42000006.text:
Hah, this won't make up for everything,
but still, you deserve a reward.

42000008.text:
I knew it'd be of poor quality.
But still, thank you.

42000009.text:
Wow, this is good!
Here's your reward!

42000010.text:
My dear turtles,
please don't get sick, meow.

42000011.text:
Now I can see the fish!
Thank you so much.

42000012.text:
Good job, mrrow!
You protected the ruins!

42000013.text:
This...?!
I don't know what it is... Heh...

42000014.text:
Wow, how marvelous!
Thank you so much.

42000015.text:
Finally, the cute sheep
can find peace!

42000016.text:
This has a weird smell,
but thanks anyway!

42000017.text:
I knew I could count on you.
Here's your reward.

42000018.text:
Such a beautiful red color.
Thank you.

42000019.text:
Look at this luminous gold color!
Wow, thank you!

42000020.text:
This is it, meow!
Thank you so much!

42000021.text:
This should do.
I owe you one.

42000022.text:
This is definitely an interesting weapon.
Thank you.

42000023.text:
Why is this popular?
I have no idea!

42000024.text:
This should do.
It serves you right, you evil <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blue Bandits</>!

42000025.text:
It's still too difficult to use the trail,
but it's better than before.

42000026.text:
Oh, thank you.
I really appreciate it.

42000027.text:
Hm... It has a weird stench.
Does this really work?

42000028.text:
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Tree Spirit</>, I'm sorry, mrrow!
It was the adventurer, not me!

42000029.text:
It serves them right!
Thank you so much.

42000030.text:
Thanks to you,
the animals will be able to sleep in relative comfort.

42000031.text:
You're pretty good.
Thank you for your help.

42000032.text:
You even took care of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Elite Hollows</>.
Not bad.

42000033.text:
Wow, thank you so much.
You've collected so many!

42000034.text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Gray Breeze</> knows nothing about this, right?
That's a relief.

42000035.text:
This is decent leather.
Here's your reward.

42000036.text:
Wow, thank you!
I'll try really hard not to lose it again.

42000038.text:
The voices of the spirits...
How come they've grown louder, meow?

42000039.text:
You Dokkaebis, it serves you right!
Hah hah!

42000040.text:
Oh, this seems like a nice specimen.
I'll look into it right away.

42000041.text:
Thank you, plog!
Ah, where's my luggage?

42000042.text:
Thank you.
I must reclaim my village, plog!

42000043.text:
I must reclaim my village, plog!
Oops, I mean, thanks!

42000044.text:
Take this reward given to you
in the name of the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</>.

42000045.text:
You're pretty good, adventurer.
Here's a special reward for you.

42000046.text:
You saved the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Peach Blossom</>.
I hope you won't mind helping us again later!

42000047.text:
You're a good adventurer, meow.
Okay, it's time I hold up my end.

42000049.text:
Thank you, adventurer. 
You're the hero of the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Fish Network</>!

42000050.text:
Everyone's singing your praises.
Here, take your reward.

42000051.text:
(It's not here.
I should check the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>other side of the lake</>.)

42000052.text:
(Not here, either.
I see another Hedgie Nest
in the trees.)

42000056.text:
(Let's see. There must be a 
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>weapon chest</> somewhere...)

42000058.text:
(This is enough.
Now, let's retrieve the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Botzym</>)

42000060.text:
(The threats around me
have been sufficiently removed.
Let's collect <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Suwa's luggage</>)

42000061.text:
(Huh, it was hard. By the way, what happened to the 
people on the 
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>wreck</>?)

42000062.text:
(I got enough. 
It's poisonous, so 
You shouldn't eat it carelessly)

42000063.text:
(This is enough. 
The taste is excellent,
I'll have to try it sometime)

42000065.text:
(Let's take a break from safety
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Gather half moon grass</>!)

42000066.text:
(This is it! 
Does it smell good?)

42000067.text:
(I have collected enough.
It's sturdy, so it would be perfect if I made it into armor.)

42000069.text:
(I saved them all.
It was a pretty tricky mission)

42000070.text:
(This should be enough for all of the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Discipline</>
to be satisfied)

42000071.text:
(Phew, it's a bit safer.
Come on, let's gather <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Swamp Herb</>)

42001000.text:
We should store it dried
and in a safe place.

42001001.text:
I wish there was
an efficient way to produce
Spider Web Protein.

42001002.text:
This is some good leather.
I'll have it delivered
to the masters.

42001003.text:
Amazing, meow!
How did you find it?
Thank you so much, mrrow!

42001004.text:
Thank you!
I'll have the engineers deployed
immediately.

42001005.text:
Everything is going as planned.
Thank you!

42001006.text:
I'm looking forward to seeing
what color will come out!

42001007.text:
It's a little quieter now,
but it's still too loud.

42001008.text:
Why is he
so fond of this?
I really have no idea.

42001009.text:
We don't have any legal ground
to stand on in this matter,
so this is the best we can do.

42001010.text:
We should quickly find
something we can use
to replace the turtle shell.

42001011.text:
May I ask you for favors again
from time to time?

42001012.text:
We'll try to keep
the people from entering.
Thank you.

42001013.text:
Thank you.
This will make
a great basket.

42001014.text:
Thank you. I didn't want
to go that way... But I
have no other choice.

42001016.text:
Until the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Scarlet Masks</>
are no more!

42001017.text:
We must find
a way to eliminate
the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>illusion</>.

42001018.text:
I will investigate and keep my mind open
to all possibilities, meow!

42001019.text:
The <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Merchant Owner</> won't be
too happy about spending money
on something like this.

42001020.text:
Oh, thank you.
Now, I can
get there safely!

42001021.text:
We will resume
our investigation, meow!

42001022.text:
Wow! This will be able save
one or two more lives.

42001023.text:
Thank you!
You've been a great help.

42001024.text:
Their numbers decreased by a lot.
Thank you!

42001025.text:
The quality seems exceptional.
Thank you.

42001026.text:
Wowzers! Now this is fine quality.
Thank you so much.

42001027.text:
The <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Nepenthes</> might look disgusting,
but I will investigate to see
if they have any medicinal effects, purr!

42001028.text:
It's not the ultimate solution,
but still, thanks!

42001029.text:
It looks fine to me.
Hahaha!

42001031.text:
The <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Edeta</> Members
are being deployed and should be
sorted out soon.

42001032.text:
This is some fine oil!
You have my gratitude.

42001033.text:
Oh! How did you
get this goat milk?
It's amazing, purrr.

42001034.text:
I'll be able to create
a good brush with
this straight, fine hair.

42001035.text:
It's noisy
around here because of
the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Lapriels</> and <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Simyus</>.

42001036.text:
The safety of the tourists
should always be
our top priority.

42001037.text:
There will be a lot of added value
if the artisans add
their personal touch to it.

42001038.text:
This leather seems to be of fine quality,
judging by how durable it looks.

42001039.text:
They might not have any harmful intentions,
but they're still our enemy.

42001040.text:
You just can't cut it off
once you've had a taste of it! Argh!

42001041.text:
It might smell a little strange...
But it'll definitely work,
mrrow!

42001042.text:
You're a trustworthy adventurer.
Here's a special reward for you.

42001043.text:
You're really skilled!
Here's your reward!

42001044.text:
Thank you, as always.
I really appreciate it!

42001045.text:
This is a special reward
from the Sol Seekers captain.

42001046.text:
You're a good adventurer, meow.
Okay, it's time I hold up my end.

42001048.text:
Everyone's singing your praises.
Here, take your reward.

42001049.text:
(The surrounding threats have 
enough been removed.
Let's find the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Secret Book</>)

42001050.text:
(This gave me enough time to 
gather 
the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>turtle eggs</>)

42001052.text:
(Phew, we killed them all. 
Let's recover <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Botzym</> in this gap!)

42001053.text:
(This is enough.
Now let's get rid of the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>garbage</>?)

42002000.text:
We don't know
when we might need that camp
again, do we?

42002001.text:
If we can't do anything about our ears...
I guess we need to
eliminate the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Mandaravas</>, right?

42002002.text:
If an <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Oduksini</> gives you a riddle
that you can't answer,
just turn around and run.

42002003.text:
A powerful poison
always has its uses.

42002004.text:
Thank you.
Isn't it great that the field is
safe and sound now?

42002005.text:
It's very straight and fine,
and makes for
great brush material.

42002006.text:
We've eliminated the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Oduksinis</>
whenever we could,
but there's still a lot of them left.

42002007.text:
Thanks for helping, meow!
I'll see you around!

42002008.text:
The <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Peach Blossom</> should
monopolize this black color.

42002009.text:
If this is processed well,
it will sell for a high price.

42002010.text:
I'd like to thank you
on behalf of the many others you've helped.

42002011.text:
I can't quit.
It's in a researcher's nature
to try to discover the truth.

42002012.text:
Why are there so many <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Night Gargoyles</>? Hiss!
There're even more than before, meow!

42002013.text:
It seems to be some useless grass,
but I will investigate it
thoroughly, mrrow!

42002014.text:
Thank you.
I'll pass it on to the investigation team
and have them look into it.

42002015.text:
I may be crazy about herbs,
but we'd better check
if it's safe, meow!

42002016.text:
We'll also go
and get rid of them.
Thank you.

42002017.text:
Looks good to me.
I should also think about
how to domesticate this.

42002018.text:
I hope I can get
at least one. That'll bring me
a huge profit.

42002019.text:
One day, we will drive
the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Tarite</> out!

42002020.text:
I find the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Nepenthes</>
totally disgusting and repulsive.

42002021.text:
Thank you.
I've brought enough
to use for now.

42002022.text:
This is good leather.
It'll make for
some quality parchment.

42002023.text:
It just looks like an old tool.
Even so, I should
still investigate it.

42002024.text:
I need to test the medicine...
Are you interested, mrrow?

42002025.text:
I hope it goes away somewhere
where I never have to see it again.

42002026.text:
Oh ho! I love it!
May I ask you again next time?

42002027.text:
If only the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</>
had properly put a stop to them.

42002028.text:
Good, I've been waiting for this.
Here's your reward.

42002029.text:
You're really skilled!
Here's your reward!

42002030.text:
Thank you, as always.
I really appreciate it!

42002031.text:
This is a special reward
from the Sol Seekers captain.

42002032.text:
You're a good adventurer, meow.
Okay, it's time I hold up my end.

42002034.text:
Everyone's singing your praises.
Here, take your reward.

42002051.text:
(이걸 후식으로 먹었다고?
소화에 도움이 되는 걸까?)

42002052.text:
(이걸로 더 좋은 장비를
만들 수 있다면 좋겠군)

42002053.text:
(독도 잘 쓰면
약으로 사용할 수 있구나)

42002054.text:
(확실히 껍질이 딱딱해서
공격이 잘 먹히지 않겠어)

42002062.text:
(조사도 좋지만...
위험한 곳은 피하는 게 좋을 텐데)

42003003.text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>It will be helpful for \nresearch on the Black Dawn</>)

42003004.text: (Now the crew can get out safely.)

42003005.text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>The Black Dawn</> would be a negative target for everyone)

42003006.text: (I guess that's all I can help \n)

42003007.text: (Is this <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Lotus leaf</> harmless to human body?)

42003008.text: (Even if you know it's going to pop out, you'll be surprised...)

42003009.text: (Now you should be able to \nfind <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>animal bones</>)

42003011.text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Myunghyedan</> is on an expedition to a dangerous place)

42003012.text: (Now you should be able to find <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Secret Book</>)

42003013.text: (You are doing a lot of research \n to make good ingredients!)

42003014.text: (Okay! It seems that the crew safely escaped the \nforest)

42003015.text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Bear</> and <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Spider</>\n so defense is getting harder)

42003016.text: (You can't become a senior \n without going through a freshman)

42003018.text: (Not because I like leather\nI just want several?)

42003019.text: (Why did he have to have a human face?)

42003021.text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Barong</> will do a good job of collecting it, right?)

42003023.text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hyojo</>'s feather as a writing instrument?\nYou can use it like that)

42003024.text: (Um? It smells bad. \n Gathering must be a lot of trouble)

42003025.text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>How are you going to use the blood of metallurgy</>?)

42003026.text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Myunghyedan</> is really researching a variety of things)

42003027.text: (Now the operation will be \n a little easier, right?)

42003028.text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>The number of poison worms</> has been reduced, so we can handle it now)

42003029.text: (Is this processed and used as a material?)

42003032.text: (Ashes as a material? \n Wouldn't that have the opposite effect?)

42003033.text: (The merchants have to come to a place like this to work)

42003034.text: (Humans like this? \nHow do you do that...)

42003036.text: (If you suddenly come out of your side, you must be surprised)

42003037.text: (Is it possible to wash in water?)

42003039.text: (If you drill a hole in here and blow on it, it makes a sound?)

42003040.text: (Now you can get to where the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ereda</> crews are)

42003041.text: (Crack research is never an easy task)

42003042.text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Weeping</> is suffering so much\nYou have to deal with it with care)

42003043.text: (It won't be easy to deal with...)

42003045.text: (It's not easy to break through \n I'll have to attack persistently)

42003048.text: (I wish I could find out information from this...)

42003049.text: (What is this to \n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>beasts</> who live well in nature...)

42003050.text: (It's really endless.\nWhere does it come from?)

42003051.text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Geumgyeongcheolmun</>'s weapon is also stolen from you)

42003053.text: (Isn't it okay to just use sheep, duck, or goose down?)

42003054.text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</> completed two collaborations. \nLet's go get a reward)

42003055.text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Geumgyeongcheolmun</> completed two collaborations.\nWould you like to receive a reward?)

42003057.text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Suyang</>Completed the two collaborations requested by you.\nLet's go get the reward!)

42003058.text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Young Gyowon</> performed \nCollaborative twice.\nWill the reward be well received?)

42003059.text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Completed 2 collaborations commissioned by Myunghyedan</>. Let's check the rewards)

42003060.text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ereda</> completed two collaborations requested.\nLet's get a reward)

42003065.text: (It stretches well, so you can use it like this \n)

42003066.text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Balbali</> is used in so many different places)

42003067.text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Dohwasangjeon</> is a unique idea.\nIs that a way to make money?)

42003069.text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Alligator</> There are many other dangerous things...)

42003072.text: (Enemy loses one weapon, \nwe get one weapon)

42003073.text: (What did you eat to get this big?)

42003074.text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Fat</> ingredients will be different for each animal)

42003077.text: (<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Securing hilly land</> would be very important)
